tasks.task_description: Use AWS Documentation MCP to research React + DynamoDB best practices
Use AWS API MCP to test current marketplace API endpoints
Use Git Repo Research MCP to find React marketplace examples
Implement SolutionCard component with Tailwind CSS
Build CatalogPage with search and filtering
Add loading states and error handling
Test frontend with deployed AWS infrastructure

description: Complete Task 6 - React Frontend for Marketplace Browsing using MCP servers for specialized tasks
context:
Successfully used MCP servers for specialized tasks:
1. AWS Documentation MCP: Found DynamoDB best practices for marketplace applications including security, transactions, and monitoring
2. AWS API MCP: Verified marketplace infrastructure is deployed with API Gateway endpoints for catalog, user management, partner operations, and payments
3. Git Repo Research MCP: Found AWS CDK examples and React patterns from official AWS repositories

Key findings:
- Marketplace API is live at: https://1d98dlxxhh.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/prod/
- Available endpoints: /catalog, /catalog/search, /catalog/categories, /catalog/{solutionId}
- Infrastructure includes Cognito User Pool, DynamoDB tables, S3 assets bucket
- Need to configure frontend environment variables with discovered values
